description.zh-CN: 柔和、圆角介面搭配温和阴影和平滑过渡。强谾舒适亲和力、温暖体验和友善视觉语言。完美适用于现代应用的独特视觉语言。融合美学原理与功能设计元素，创造引人入胜的用户体验。
description.en-US: Soft, rounded interface design with gentle shadows and smooth transitions emphasizing comfort and approachability Creates friendly interfaces through soft edges, subtle shadows, and smooth motion design for warm, welcoming experiences Brings soft, neumorphic design elements Ideal for modern applications, consumer products, and approachable user experiences This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. comfort-focused interface design and approachable aesthetics. Excellence in design. Emphasizes comfort-focused design with approachable aesthetics and emotionally supportive visual language.
